verses.text_plain: Give the king thy judgments, O God, and thy righteousness unto the king’s son.
verses.verse_html:
1Give the king thy judgments, O God, and thy righteousness unto the king’s son. ▼
▼ for: or, of

verses.text_plain: He shall judge thy people with righteousness, and thy poor with judgment.
verses.verse_html: 2He shall judge thy people with righteousness, and thy poor with judgment.

verses.text_plain: The mountains shall bring peace to the people, and the little hills, by righteousness.
verses.verse_html: 3The mountains shall bring peace to the people, and the little hills, by righteousness.

verses.text_plain: He shall judge the poor of the people, he shall save the children of the needy, and shall break in pieces the oppressor.
verses.verse_html: 4He shall judge the poor of the people, he shall save the children of the needy, and shall break in pieces the oppressor.

verses.text_plain: They shall fear thee as long as the sun and moon endure, throughout all generations.
verses.verse_html: 5They shall fear thee as long as the sun and moon endure, throughout all generations.

verses.text_plain: He shall come down like rain upon the mown grass: as showers that water the earth.
verses.verse_html: 6He shall come down like rain upon the mown grass: as showers that water the earth.

verses.text_plain: In his days shall the righteous flourish; and abundance of peace so long as the moon endureth.
verses.verse_html:
7In his days shall the righteous flourish; and abundance of peace so long as the moon endureth. ▼
▼ so long…: Heb. till there be no moon

footnotes.body_text: ▼ so long…: Heb. till there be no moon
footnotes.body_html: ▼ so long…: Heb. till there be no moon

verses.text_plain: He shall have dominion also from sea to sea, and from the river unto the ends of the earth.
verses.verse_html: 8He shall have dominion also from sea to sea, and from the river unto the ends of the earth.

verses.text_plain: They that dwell in the wilderness shall bow before him; and his enemies shall lick the dust.
verses.verse_html: 9They that dwell in the wilderness shall bow before him; and his enemies shall lick the dust.

tokens.text: They that dwell in the wilderness

verses.text_plain: The kings of Tarshish and of the isles shall bring presents: the kings of Sheba and Seba shall offer gifts.
verses.verse_html: 10The kings of Tarshish and of the isles shall bring presents: the kings of Sheba and Seba shall offer gifts.

verses.text_plain: Yea, all kings shall fall down before him: all nations shall serve him.
verses.verse_html: 11Yea, all kings shall fall down before him: all nations shall serve him.

verses.text_plain: For he shall deliver the needy when he crieth; the poor also, and him that hath no helper.
verses.verse_html: 12For he shall deliver the needy when he crieth; the poor also, and him that hath no helper.

verses.text_plain: He shall spare the poor and needy, and shall save the souls of the needy.
verses.verse_html: 13He shall spare the poor and needy, and shall save the souls of the needy.

verses.text_plain: He shall redeem their soul from deceit and violence: and precious shall their blood be in his sight.
verses.verse_html: 14He shall redeem their soul from deceit and violence: and precious shall their blood be in his sight.

verses.text_plain: And he shall live, and to him shall be given of the gold of Sheba: prayer also shall be made for him continually; and daily shall he be praised.
verses.verse_html:
15And he shall live, and to him shall be given of the gold of Sheba: prayer also shall be made for him continually; and daily shall he be praised. ▼
▼ shall be given: Heb. one shall give

tokens.text: and to him shall be given

footnotes.body_text: ▼ shall be given: Heb. one shall give
footnotes.body_html: ▼ shall be given: Heb. one shall give

verses.text_plain: There shall be an handful of corn in the earth upon the top of the mountains; the fruit thereof shall shake like Lebanon: and they of the city shall flourish like grass of the earth.
verses.verse_html: 16There shall be an handful of corn in the earth upon the top of the mountains; the fruit thereof shall shake like Lebanon: and they of the city shall flourish like grass of the earth.

verses.text_plain: His name shall endure for ever: his name shall be continued as long as the sun: and men shall be blessed in him: all nations shall call him blessed.
verses.verse_html:
17His name shall endure for ever: his name shall be continued as long as the sun: and men shall be blessed in him: all nations shall call him blessed. ▼
▼ endure: Heb. be
 , ▼
▼ his name shall be…: Heb. shall be as a son to continue his father’s name for ever

footnotes.body_text: ▼ his name shall be…: Heb. shall be as a son to continue his father’s name for ever
footnotes.body_html: ▼ his name shall be…: Heb. shall be as a son to continue his father’s name for ever

verses.text_plain: Blessed be the Lord God, the God of Israel, who only doeth wondrous things.
verses.verse_html: 18Blessed be the Lord God, the God of Israel, who only doeth wondrous things.

verses.text_plain: And blessed be his glorious name for ever: and let the whole earth be filled with his glory; Amen, and Amen.
verses.verse_html: 19And blessed be his glorious name for ever: and let the whole earth be filled with his glory; Amen, and Amen.

verses.text_plain: The prayers of David the son of Jesse are ended.
verses.verse_html: 20The prayers of David the son of Jesse are ended.
